verses.roman:
ānande nācaye sabe bali' 'hari' 'hari'
ācārya-mandira haila śrī-vaikuṇṭha-purī

synonyms: ānande—in pleasure; nācaye—dance; sabe—all; bali'-saying; hari hari—the holy name of the Lord; ācārya-mandira—the house of Advaita Ācārya; haila—became; śrī-vaikuṇṭha-purī—a spiritual Vaikuṇṭha planet.
translation: Everyone was chanting the holy names of Hari and dancing. In this way the domicile of Advaita Ācārya was converted into Śrī Vaikuṇṭha Purī.
